title: Olive Harvesting with a Tree Shaker - Jared Gulian

tasks.task: Operating a combine harvester on a wheat field.
subtasks: Starting the combine harvester.
Guiding the combine harvester through the wheat field.
Overseeing the combine harvester's operation to ensure efficient grain harvesting.
Monitoring the combine harvester's grain collection.

tasks.task: Loading harvested wheat onto a truck.
subtasks: Moving to the loading area.
Checking the truck's capacity for harvested wheat.
Using a forklift or similar equipment to load the wheat onto the truck.

tasks.task: Driving the loaded truck to the grain storage facility.
subtasks: Starting the truck's engine.
Checking the truck's brakes and tires for safety.
Navigating the farm roads to the grain storage facility.

tasks.task: Unloading wheat from the truck into the storage facility.
subtasks: Parking the truck in the designated unloading area.
Using a conveyor belt or similar system to unload the wheat.
Verifying the amount of wheat unloaded and reported to the grain office.
